subject: Re: [junit] Help, can test cases be retrieved from the package they are in?
msgSnippet: ... Also look for DirectorySuiteBuilder. They do similar things. I don t recommend one over the other, and have used both. -- J. B. (Joe) Rainsberger ::
messageBody:
Bradley, Todd wrote:

> Google for "RecursiveTestSuite".

Also look for DirectorySuiteBuilder. They do similar things. I don't
recommend one over the other, and have used both.
--
J. B. (Joe) Rainsberger :: http://www.jbrains.info
Your guide to software craftsmanship
JUnit Recipes: Practical Methods for Programmer Testing
2005 Gordon Pask Award for contribution Agile Software Practice
